title: Thunderbolt / Kneeling / Diamond
description: Sit with your legs folded underneath you, knees touching. Bring your big toes to touch and separate your heels. Reach the crown of your head toward the sky. Rest your hands on your thighs. Close your eyes. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Modification: Separate your knees slightly. Avoid this pose if you have weak knees.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
